entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regex should explicitly target IndexOfAnyExcept(char {, char, char}) when handling non-ASCII vectorized sets #84150
    8.0.0
  • Regex should advance bumpalong position for partially-matched starting loop minimums #84149
    8.0.0
  • Unable to use hosting APIs to load managed assemblies from an ICorProfilerCallback implementation #84143
  • APICompat doesn't capture all changes that might happen during servicing #84142
  • HttpClient call is giving 104 connection reset by peer after migrating to .net 6.0 #84138
  • Environment.IsPrivilegedProcess unexpectedly returns true on Windows #84137
  • Is There a Plan to Support TLS Session Resumption Without Server-Side State RFC 5077 #84136
  • Подробное решение проблемы Запуск программы невозможен так как на компьютере отсутствует api-ms-win-crt-runtime-l1-1-0.dll описано тут [https://it-men.su/windows-error/api-ms-win-crt-runtime-l1-1-0.dll](https://it-men.su/windows-error/api-ms-win-crt-runtime-l1-1-0.dll) #84131
  • GenerateRuntimeGraph fails when building runtime in source-build mode on Alpine #84127
  • Span.Fill(0) vs Span.Clear() #84126
  • Regressions in System.Net.Tests.Perf_WebUtility #84140
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Common #84139
    8.0.0
  • ILLink analyzer and code fixer passed twice to the csc #84119
    8.0.0
  • Parsing assembly qualified type name fails #84118
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add the ability to specify line endings when serializing Json #84117
    Future
  • [mono] Optimize computing a bitmap for structs with InlineArray attribute #84116
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Assertion failed 'node->IsUnusedValue() && "found an unmarked unused value"' - when compiling System.Net.Sockets.Tests #84112
    8.0.0
  • Reference assemblies should not be loaded for execution #84108
  • Determine why analyzers are running on generated not supported assemblies auto-generated files #84104

Closed

  • I accidentaly found performance reggresion using"mandelbrot algorithm" #80757
    8.0.0
  • Unexpected breaking change in .NET 7 #81506
    7.0.x
  • asmhelpers.asm(5210) : warning A4228: Alignment value exceeds AREA alignment; alignment not guaranteed #77146
    8.0.0
  • Failure in System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests.Platform_TimeZoneNames(tzi: (UTC+03:30) Iran Standard Time #84130
  • Better reflection type name parser for the AOT compiler #72833
    8.0.0
  • Enable deduplication of generics in Xamarin.iOS build #83193
    8.0.0
  • JsonSerializer bug #84125
  • [jitstress-random] Failure in profiler/handles/handles/handles #83962
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServices version 7.0.0 not working in .NET 6 #79929
    Future
  • Obsolete JsonSerializerOptions.AddContext #83280
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.Json.Functional.Tests failed in CI on mono_interpreter linux x64 Debug leg #82918
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\GitHub_18362\\GitHub_18362\\GitHub_18362.cmd #81111
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in Benchstone.BenchI.IniArray #82103
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Introduce a diagnostic switch to turn off the use of file mapping in PE loader. #84151
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Build on CBL-mariner host with rootfs #84148
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Delete `GT_ADDR` #84147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable more general BITCAST folding in local morph #84144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix type parsing error returned for type names with invalid start of assembly name #84141
    area-System.Reflection
  • Use ldp/stp with SIMD registers on Arm64 #84135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • SHA3 #84132
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add NuGet-Migrations workaround to runtime tests too #84129
    needs-area-label
  • Correction of three code comments in Dictionary.cs #84128
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • JIT: Properly allocate shadow space for block op helpers on win-x64 #84124
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Always look for SIMD fields during promotion #84122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][tests] Try to use -Os for tests linking #84121
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Introduction to vectorization with Vector128 and Vector256 #84115
    area-Meta
  • just a test #84111
    NO-REVIEW
  • Allow removal of HWIntrinsic nodes that do not have side effects #84110
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Default media type used when 'null' is passed to StringContent #81506 #83425
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, regression-from-last-release, 7.0.6
  • Fix AREA alignment warning on Windows ARM64 #84020
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update API Review Process doc with updated link and blurb #84133
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Use unsigned char when computing UTF8 string hashes #83303
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.16
  • [release/7.0][mono] Use unsigned char when computing UTF8 string hashes #83302
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.5
  • Disable System.Net.Sockets\tests\FunctionalTests\System.Net.Sockets.Tests.csproj on NativeAOT #84114
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Switch attribute equality to the valuetype equality plan #84095
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Proper type name parser for native AOT compiler #83657
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Implement MINT_SHL_AND_ in the jiterpreter #84083
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [Mono] Intrinsify multiply and divide for mini JIT on ARM64 #84004
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Implement GC descriptor for structs with InlineArray attribute #84097
    area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix profiler handle GC test #83968
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fixing a few xml doc comments for the Vector###.WithUpper APIs #84113
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Revert #80698 and obsolete JsonSerializerOptions.AddContext #84022
    area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Expose helper APIS for GetLower/Upper and WithLower/Upper #83982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [main] Update check-service-labels to trigger on branch edit #84109
    area-Infrastructure
  • [NativeAOT] Making thread local storage completely managed. #84060
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Update check-service-labels to trigger on branch edit #84107
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Update check-service-labels to trigger on branch edit #84106
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label

Updated

  • Vectorize Convert.FromHexString #82521
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance
  • Make WindowsServiceLifetime gracefully stop #83892
    area-System.ServiceProcess
  • Private API for RefreshMemoryLimit #83707
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add additional close statuses in ManagedWebSocket #83827
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [API Proposal]: Add overload for EventSource primitives #83751
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation, api-ready-for-review
  • Allow multiple EventCounters sessions and make sure EventListeners always send a Disable command #82970
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • offers to start and stop IHostedService concurrently #84048
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Always create loop pre headers #83956
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make host look for RID-specific assets via a known list by default #84100
    area-Host
  • EmptyHandle.MDStreamVersion returns -1 #83944
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Investigating timeout on debugger tests on CI #84080
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Fixes for two rare stress issues. #83908
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] Fix re-use val zero on GC tracking #84051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Take advantage of simplifications enabled by folding all indirect access to locals #79722
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] ARM64/X64 - Add `IsVNNeverNegative` #83694
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Prototype a generalized promotion pass #83388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-vm and other directories in coreclr #82381
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2147708 #84102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Initial step for adding AssemblyBuilder.Save implementation #83554
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • update data annotation error message #84078
    NO-MERGE, area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Read StartDiskNumber as uint32 #83923
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Switch mono to use cmake-detected objcopy #83903
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Convert JIT\Regression tests to merged test groups #83895
    test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fixing a bug that causes us to mistakenly demote a gen2 region to gen0 #83341
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] Fix special sweep issue for workstation #83342
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] Reverting: Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility (#81101) #83565
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] Ensure free buffer space when reading TLS messages #83574
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] Fix encoding problem when publishing #83577
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] SyntaxValueProvider: avoid performance issue with syntax list containing many items #83743
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] [MONO][MARSHAL] Initialize ilgen with a flag #83813
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] ManagedToNativeGenerator: Skip unmanaged dlls #83957
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Use CLOCK_BOOTTIME to calculate BootTime on linux (#67589) #83965
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, 6.0.17
  • [release/7.0] Fix reserving executable memory as per allocation type in ClrVirtualAllocWithinRange() #83958
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.6
  • [NO MERGE][wasm-threads] JSImport promises on background threads #83838
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-threading-mono
  • [wasm] Re-enable null check optimization for mid-method traces #84058
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0] SyntaxValueProvider: avoid performance issue with syntax list containing many items #83742
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 6.0.17
  • Run NativeAot tests on arm64 #82307
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Refactor `Interop.LocalAlloc` #82450
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Use timeouts in 2 socket test cases #84030
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [browser] Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #84082
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [release/7.0] JIT: fix bug in cloning conditions for jagged array (#83414) #83462
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.6
  • [Mono] Use dn_vector_t instead of GArray in a few places #84027
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • More efficient executable allocator #83632
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` change case #84019
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Vectorize Enumerable.Range(...).ToArray() #80633
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Change `callvirt` into `calli` for virtual delegates #83461
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Static cctor analysis for reflection #84089
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Change IsolatedStorageFile path for mobile #83380
    area-System.IO, os-android, os-ios
  • Add support for Inline TLS field access in JIT #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-pal and coreclr-debug directories #82380
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use similar types for self-referential generics instead of the exact canonical type #83995
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Update CodeAnalysis.src.globalconfig #84059
    area-Meta
  • Add linker flags to add fixup data to PDBs (#58417) #84099
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add MemoryStream.ctor(Memory<byte>) #84103
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • BeforeBuild Target order not being respected by dotnet build. #13051
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Options.dll has version 7.0.1 at Nuget but downloaded DLL is version 7.0.0.0 #31527

Updated

  • The error message (& output) for NETSDK1148 could be MUCH more helpful #31557
  • Cannot enumerate VS workloads on ARM64 (exception in `dotnet --info`) #31552
  • System.Buffers, System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe, etc cannot be loaded #31147

PullRequests

Created

  • Move asset compression to the StaticWebAssets SDK #31559
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • 9500 dotnet tool install: Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade when specify version #31549
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • GenAPI should not filter out base generic interfaces. #31545
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI
  • containers: updated 7.0.3xx release notes #31543
    Area-Containers
  • syncing the logic in `CreateNewImage` and `ContainerBuilder` #31542
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • changes to containers tests and `ComputeDotnetBaseImageTag` #31541
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Remove unused `SourceGenerator.Tooling.Internal` version property #31533
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove ILLink version override workaround #31551
    untriaged, Area-ILLink

Updated

  • Add support for new output path format #31454
    untriaged
  • First pass at source build pre-built detection #31341
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2147544 #31526
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • extend search table with trusted and owners info #31403
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #31519
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add --create-manifest-if-needed flag #31231
    Area-Tools
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31442
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Primary Constructors #2691
    Working Set
  • Extension shadowing #7061
  • Can't use C# 8.0 using declaration with a discard #2235
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Allow nameof to always access instance members from static context #4037
    Any Time

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WrappedMethodSymbol should not override abstract methods #67580
    Compiler.Next
  • Source Generator files are being generated, are valid, can be navigated to but are marked as "not found" by the IDE #67573
  • Pasting text in snipped closes the edit mode immediately #67572
  • c# project sync namespace function is not case sensitive #67571
  • Generic Attribute not possible when passing on generic type #67569
  • [Infra] Re-enable tests that utilize `DotNetSdkMSBuildInstalled` #67566

Closed

  • Exception in user supplied comparer causes the generator driver to crash #67386
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce allocations when producing checksums. #67584
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add EE projects with IVT from compiler to Compilers.slnf #67583
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid allocating enumerators in symbol usage analysis #67582
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid allocations in 'add import' fixers #67574
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Avoid applying partial changes when a code fix contains a mix of supported and unsupported actions #67262
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove invalid implicit downcast #19932
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Cache results of parsing editorconfig values, avoiding the need for repeated costly string operations #67581
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use singletons for common conversion instances #67579
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid allocations in diagnostic computation when waiting on high pri work to complete #67577
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update PublishData.json for M2 #67578
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update to roslyn analyzers 3.3.5-beta1.23180.2 #67575
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations producing enumerators in symbol usage analysis #67576
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #67563
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Simplify logic for lightbulb priority classes #67554
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Allocate less Location objects when typing and computing diagnostics #67568
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove IsBlocking flag from CodeFixService #67570
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Catch user exceptions from source generator comparer #67459
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify DirectorySeparatorChar in PathUtilities #67545
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • [Infra] Disable tests that depend on `DotNetSdkMSBuildInstalled` and downgrade MSBuild version #67567
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Interceptors #67432
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow nested instance member access in `nameof` in static context #67461
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Analyzer load failure suppress #58376
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config
  • Add razor compiler EA assembly to VSIX #67501
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update LSP package and avoid send workspace/configuration request to client if client doesn't have the ability #67560
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Round-trip extensions via metadata #67530
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Reduce allocations based on light bulb experimentation #67203
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle assignments in patterns #67517
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Ensure generated trees have a full path #60095
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Add net8.0 TFM to source-built packages #67333
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure
  • Track MemberNotNull for local functions #63310
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, 17.5
  • Allow index initialisers to be used in fixed size buffers. #39805
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community
  • Optimize some SegmentedArrayHelper members for JIT #67558
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Async lightbulb performance improvement #66970
    Area-IDE
  • Work to unify threading concepts between Workspace and ProjectSystemProjectFactory (part1) #67522
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WebApplication.CreateSlimBuilder() should auto-register AuthN/Z middleware when associated services are added #47507
    8.0-preview4
  • Render Notification #47505
  • Cookie session ID cannot be regenerated when using a custom ticket store #47503
  • In Blazor's EditContext class, why is there no MarkAsModified method? #47497
  • [Signalr-Cpp-Client] Having trouble referencing and using the lib when cross-compiling for target linux-arm (RPi4) #47495
  • QuickGrid in NET 8 - column resizing #47494
  • Add IHttpMetricsTagsFeature and IConnectionMetricsTagsFeature #47493
  • Add IRouteDiagnosticsMetadata #47492

Closed

  • cant get windows authentication credentials via defaultcredentials #47143
    Discussions
  • Add option to refresh the claims of a logged in user from UserInfo endpoint #47125
  • `Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchangeRedis` not working with IPv6 because using an old version of `StackExchange.Redis` #45424
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Fix inconsistent cache behavior for empty buffers #38796
    8.0-preview4
  • Improve documentation for blazor authentication #47490
  • [Proposal] Leverage Sqlite for Desktop https developer-certificates. #47042
  • [Blazor] DotnetStreams bug #47473
    Backlog
  • Allow replacing the Blazor NavigationManager using an interface #46193
    Discussions
  • Blazor - JavaScript interop returns the wrong values for some types in production builds #47468
  • Adding custom events does not work as expected in Blazor, in .NET 7 and 8 #47363

PullRequests

Created

  • Replace SpanHelper.ReplacePlusWithSpace #47506
    needs-area-label
  • [DO NOT REVIEW] Throw if an https URL is added to the address collection #47501
    area-runtime, area-hosting
  • Treat 'Content-Range's with last-byte-pos equal to length as invalid #47489
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Flow FullAssemblySigningSupported for source-build to repo tasks #47421
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0-preview4
  • [cache] fix #38796 - fix inconsistent handling of empty byte[] #47491
    area-runtime, feature-caching, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add MapIdentity<TUser>() #47414
    area-identity
  • Enable AOT template tests #47247
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks
  • Add metrics to hosting and Kestrel #46834
    area-runtime, * NO MERGE *
  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play (Redux) #47454
    area-runtime
  • Hash routing to named element #47320
    area-blazor
  • Initial streaming SSR mechanisms #47484
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-united, 8.0-preview3
  • [release/7.0] Fix sending to another client from OnConnectedAsync #47204
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • `objsize $object` reports "Specified method is not supported" #3793

Updated

  • dotnet-counter doesn't display UpDownCounter #3742
    8.0.0
  • Post-Mortem Native and Managed Heap Diagnostics Improvements #3736
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable `UpDownCounter` For Dotnet-Counters and Dotnet-Monitor #3795

Merged

  • Fix issue where DmlExec isn't implemented in Repl #3794
    auto-merge
  • Improve !maddress #3792
    enhancement, auto-merge
  • Add GC inter-generational analysis commands #3790
    enhancement, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Snap main #3789
    DO NOT MERGE

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET MAUI targeting Windows does not show/display #14309
  • MAUI iOS simulator build does not include in plist all build environment properties #14306
  • Grid star (Image?) behaviour inconsistent across platforms #14305
  • Obsolete FocusChangeRequested #14299
    Backlog
  • Label no longer wrapping / measuring correctly inside Grid when available size shrinks enough #14296
    Backlog
  • Inside Stacklayout ScrollView not working #4176 #14293
  • Buttons at end of layout (and Gesture Recognizers) do not trigger! ... Unless you HOT RELOAD the page #14292
  • MAUI appicon and splash not updating on iOS device #14288
  • Path Quality losses in Windows platforn #14286
  • OnNavigatedTo and OnAppearing not being called #14284
    Backlog
  • The WindowSoftInputMode property on the Activity attribute is ignored #14281
    Backlog

Closed

  • IsPassword Property of Entry control does not work for the numeric keyboard when set dynamically. #12332
    Backlog
  • Input in Entry filed with Keyboard="Numeric" does not accept "," input #12424
    Backlog
  • Performance degradation when navigating to a page and going back several times #12930
    Backlog
  • MenuBarItems Doesn't Work Correctly in Multi-Windows on MacCatalyst #10702
    Backlog
  • Unable to compile solution on VS for MAC #14169
  • We need a TouchGestureRecognizer ASAP #14297
  • blazor winform publish #13539
  • Where is SpeechRecognizer? #14294
  • Demand Suggestions #14283
  • XAML Hot Reload is broken within Shell.TitleView #13992
    Backlog
  • When two control views overlap, setting the opacity and TranslationY properties is invalid #11658
    Backlog
  • Animated gifs never stop #7020
    Backlog
  • Maui Performance Issues #14227
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Trimming / AOT issue after publish in .NET MAUI Blazor app #14271
  • (Windows) RC1 - RefreshView does not appear when swiping down with mouse #6404
    Backlog
  • `Microsoft.Maui.Resizetizer.targets` breaks build on macOS #14279
  • unexpected platformView for grid layout #14144
  • IsEnabled is unable to update visual appearance #13971

PullRequests

Created

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Casting using an Explicit Static Operator breaks Include Statements #30599
  • Mapping an enum to an integer breaks JSON data #30598
  • "dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold" should generate #nullable enable #30597
  • JSON column update not tracked as "Modified" in ChangeTracker state #30596

Closed

  • Optional RestartSequenceOperation.StartValue #26560
    8.0.0
  • Migrations fails since EF Core 7.0.4 #30503
  • Translate DateTimeOffset.ToUnixTime[Seconds|Milliseconds] #28925
    8.0.0
  • EF core 7 is not allowing to map multiple properties of an entity with single database column whereas it was working in earlier EF Core versions #30488
  • OwnsMany when updating owner entity doesn't perform insert statement if the owned entity contains a Guid property #30558
  • StoreTypeNameBase isn't trimmed #30592
    8.0.0
  • Partial clearing of tracked entities #30540

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Fix for #30266 and #30565 - projecting json entity/reference as well as regular entity collection #30600
    Servicing-consider

Merged

  • Proposed fix for Optional RestartSequenceOperation.StartValue #26560 #29346
    providers-beware, community-contribution
  • Translate DateTimeOffset.ToUnixTime[Seconds|Milliseconds] #28978
  • Trim the mapping store type base name #30593
    auto-merge

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30115 - IndexOutOfRangeException in CreateNavigationExpansionExpression #30591
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.6
  • Sequence cache support #29716
    waiting-for-response
